venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

venue.displayName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: Fiorentina missed out on the chance to draw level on points with seventh-placed Napoli as they were held to a 1-1 draw at home to Parma in Serie A.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fiorentina fight back to earn draw against Parma

headlines.description: Lazio recorded their first away win against AC Milan in Serie A in 30 years to move into fourth with a 2-1 victory Sunday at San Siro.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lazio end Milan curse to move into top four with win
